body:
Comment 1: 
We moved the packages that were in good shape to subrepositories,
but exp/types did not move, because it is not yet complete.
If you would like to use it, you are welcome to make a copy of it,
but we don't want to move it into a subrepository because we want
the flexibility to make arbitrary changes and know we won't break
any users.

Once exp/types is complete it will be part of the standard distribution.

Sorry for the trouble.  The best solution for now is to make your own
copy.  The code is still in the Mercurial repository default branch.

Russ
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
